attributes.action: allow domain name suffixes of .ker (Cornwall), .Cym (Wales), .Sco (Scotland) and .eng (England) in addition to the existing .co.uk suffix
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With growing regional identification and specific businesses operating exclusively within each of these nations it has become necessary to allow a more personalised domain name suffix.
As yet there are no campaigns for N.Ireland and the Isle of Man, which is why they have been excluded from this petition.
